Job Summary
Versatile knowledge on Adobe Premiere and Adobe After Effects.Knowledge of photoshop for image editing & infographics design.Familiarity with special effects, 3D and compositing will be preferred.Create an output from a brief, and maybe an outline of footage and/or a shot list, script, or screenplay.Continuously discover and implement new editing technologies.Manipulate and edit film pieces,Review shooting script,Ensure logical sequencing and smooth running, Input music, dialogues, graphics and effects,Trim footage segments.experience with digital technology Video/Audio editing software.Skills RequiredCreate YouTube style videosShould display creativity in converting ideas into videos in quick time.Good communication skills both written and verbalFamiliarity with special effects, 3D and compositingA keen eye for detail and a critical mindIndustry: ITFunctional Areas: Video Editing, Compositing, Audio, Visual effects, film making, media

Job Types: Full-time, Internship

Experience:

Work: 1 year (Preferred)
Graphics Design: 1 year (Preferred)
